description: Useful links to active travel related information, including walking and cycling.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Walk, cycle and discover London this summer.","Why not improve your health, save money, and experience London in a different way? Leave your car at home and walk or cycle instead."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"video","style":"oscipmO41J4","title":"Try a new route, find a new London","link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Walking"}
Research by Public Health England shows that leaving your car at home and walking briskly for just ten minutes, twice a day, improves your health.
In London, at least 42% of adults aren't doing enough physical activity to stay healthy.
{"template":"start-row","link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Cycling"}

The number of cyclists on London's roads has almost doubled in the last ten years. Our Quietways and Cycle Superhighways have transformed streets, making cycling easier, safer and available to everyone.
Why not brush up on your cycle skills with a free Cycle Skills session ? Whether you've just starting cycling, or you ride regularly, you can improve your cycling in our free tailored sessions.
{"template":"start-row","link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
